quote: If you focus on results and finding shortcuts, you'll get impatient. If you focus on the process and doing the right thing, you'll be unstoppable. – Maxime Lagace
fact: A Boeing 747s wingspan is longer than the Wright brother's first flight.
joke: What's the difference between a hippo and a zippo? One is really heavy, the other is a little lighter.
